title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 750-1.15 - Duration of SPDES permits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 750-1.15 - Duration of SPDES permits

State Regulations
SPDES permits issued for discharges to waters of the

State other than groundwaters shall be valid for a fixed term not to exceed
five years. SPDES permits issued for discharges to groundwaters shall be valid
for a term not to exceed 10 years. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
750-1.15

Amended

New

York State Register November 9, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 45, eff. 11/9/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
